main event: A round object of nickel with red and yellow color was sighted in Oregon City in July 1958.
interesting points: The object had no flashing lights and disappeared instantaneously at the location it was first spotted.,The object was observed for approximately 5 minutes.,It was reported by a civilian source.,The report mentions possible explanations including balloon, aircraft, and astronomical phenomena.,Insufficient data was provided for a definitive evaluation.
sighted object: one round object of nickel with red and yellow color
